pages.text: $(6)Luck$() is a very peculiar effect.$(p)Having more luck means you can receive better loot from certain sources.$(p)Unfortunately, there's no way to tell what loot sources are impacted by $(6)Luck$().

pages.title: Brewing Recipe
pages.text: This potion can be crafted with an Awkward Potion and a Lucky Rabbit's Foot.$(p)The Lucky Rabbit's Foot is rarely dropped by rabbits.
